CustomField.description: (Optional) Influences the order in which capabilities might be presented or considered by the agent. Lower numbers first.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: (Optional) Enter a number (e.g., 10, 20, 100) to influence the order in which capabilities might be presented or considered by the agent, especially if multiple similar capabilities are bound. Lower numbers generally have higher priority. Leave as default (100) if specific ordering isn't required.
CustomField.label: Capability Priority
